problem_definition.command_line:
../../../bin/multiphase_prototype BL_1d_Gravity_A.mpml
mkdir BL_1d_Gravity_A_output
mv *.d.* BL_1d_Gravity_A_output
cp BL_1d_Gravity_A.mpml BL_1d_Gravity_B.mpml sed -i 's/_A/_B/' BL_1d_Gravity_B.mpml
../../../bin/multiphase_prototype BL_1d_Gravity_B.mpml
mkdir BL_1d_Gravity_B_output
mv *.d.* BL_1d_Gravity_B_output
rm -f BL_1d_Gravity_B.mpml
